snippet.title: Scatteria Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
My first post apocalyptic pixelart platformer shooter game called Scatteria is coming to steam soon!

Wishlist it now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/926400/Scatteria/

Scatteria is hectic shooter game that is inspired from old 90`s games like Liero, worms and soldat. It has local splitscreen support up to 4 players.
